body:
I'm probably way off base here, because I have been engrossed in some other stuff lately, but shouldn't this already be eventually resulting in `1 = 0` based on:

```ruby
         values_predicate = if values.include?(nil)
            values = values.compact

            case values.length
            when 0
              attribute.eq(nil)
            when 1
              attribute.eq(values.first).or(attribute.eq(nil))
            else
              attribute.in(values).or(attribute.eq(nil))
            end
          else
            attribute.in(values) # <== This is where an empty array should end up
          end
```

and this, from ARel:

```ruby
      def visit_Arel_Nodes_In o
        if Array === o.right && o.right.empty?
          '1=0'
        else
          "#{visit o.left} IN (#{visit o.right})"
        end
      end

      def visit_Arel_Nodes_NotIn o
        if Array === o.right && o.right.empty?
          '1=1'
        else
          "#{visit o.left} NOT IN (#{visit o.right})"
        end
      end
```

At least, I think that's why I wrote that code. :confused:
